entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content:
• I am currently an undergraduate student in Nanjing, China.
  • I have board subject background including Environmental Science (Undergraduate Major), Computational Mathematics, Mathematics Statistics & Probability Theory(Expected M.S.) and Applied Statistics.
  • I expect to be a scholar in the field of statistics and applied mathematics or data analyst for application in the future.
  • Choice of homepage theme is from ‘The Legend of Zelda’, a series of outstanding console games which have brought me happiness.
